name: mri_mask
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Applies a mask volume (typically skull stripped)

inputs.description: Input volume file
inputs.name: Input Volume

inputs.description: Mask volume file
inputs.name: Mask Volume

inputs.description: Output volume file
inputs.name: Output Volume

inputs.description: Apply M3Z/LTA to transform mask to the space of input volume (identity.nofile possible, will invert if needed)
inputs.name: Transformation

inputs.description: Source volume for -xform (if not available from the xform file)
inputs.name: LTA Source

inputs.description: Destination volume for -xform (if not available from the xform file)
inputs.name: LTA Destination

inputs.description: Threshold mask volume at a given threshold (values <= threshold considered zero)
inputs.name: Threshold

inputs.description: Create a bounding box around the mask expanded by npad voxels in each direction
inputs.name: Bounding Box Padding

inputs.description: Create a bounding box around the mask expanded by npad1 npad2 npad3 voxels in each direction
inputs.name: Bounding Box Padding Vector

inputs.description: Create a bounding box around the mask, expanded by npad1a npad1b npad2a npad2b npad3a npad3b in each direction
inputs.name: Bounding Box Full Padding Vector

inputs.description: Take absolute value before applying threshold
inputs.name: Absolute Flag

inputs.description: Invert mask
inputs.name: Invert Mask Flag

inputs.description: Turn off inversion of mask
inputs.name: No Invert Mask Flag

inputs.description: Set mask in right hemisphere labels to 1 (assumes input mask is an aseg)
inputs.name: Right Hemisphere Label Flag

inputs.description: Set mask in left hemisphere labels to 1 (assumes input mask is an aseg)
inputs.name: Left Hemisphere Label Flag

inputs.description: Dilate mask N times before applying
inputs.name: Dilate Mask

inputs.description: Remove cerebellum from aseg mask (assumes input mask is an aseg)
inputs.name: No Cerebellum Flag

inputs.description: Use specified oval value as output instead of 0
inputs.name: Oval Value

inputs.description: Transfer only the specified voxel value from mask to output
inputs.name: Transfer Value

inputs.description: Transfer voxel-deletion edits (voxels=1) from mask to output volume
inputs.name: Keep Mask Deletion Edits Flag

inputs.description: Assume mask is a SAMSEG segmentation and mask all non-brain labels
inputs.name: SAMSEG Segmentation Flag
